id.description: A unique identifier for the word. Usually the word but may have an integer added in case of a word with multiple definitions (like "we")

author_verbatim.description: The author's original definition, taken verbatim in their words

author_verbatim_source.description: Where the author's original definition is located (usually Discord)

book.description: Which official Toki Pona book was this word featured in, if any.

coined_era.description: When this word was coined (relative to the publication dates of the official Toki Pona books, if known)

coined_year.description: The year when this word was coined (if known)

creator.description: The person who created this word (if known)

additionalProperties.description: The percentage of ku survey respondents who report this translation as accurate to their usage.

ku_data.description: The usage data of the word as described in ku (the official Toki Pona dictionary)

sona_pona.description: A link to the word's page on sona.pona.la, a Toki Pona wiki. May redirect for words with references but no dedicated page.

lipamanka_semantic.description: A link to lipamanka's description of the word's semantic space.

resources.description: Non-Linku resources related to the specific word, such as wiki links.

sitelen_emosi.description: The sitelen emosi representation of this word, a script for writing Toki Pona using emoji

ligatures.description: A list of sitelen Lasina representations of the word, used by ligature fonts to visually convert latin characters into sitelen pona

sitelen_sitelen.description: A URL pointing to an image of this word's sitelen sitelen hieroglyphic block

ucsur.description: The word's UCSUR codepoint, as defined in https://www.kreativekorp.com/ucsur/charts/sitelen.html

representations.description: Ways of representing this word in the real world, via text/computers

source_language.description: The language this word originated from

usage_category.description: The word's usage category, according to a survey performed by the Linku Project

word.description: The word's actual text, in case of a word with multiple definitions (like "we")
One of the root words of this word, as written out in its language of origin

alt.description: A latinized representation of the "word" field

etymology.description: Unlocalized etymological values regarding this word's origin

author.description: The author of the audio file in `link`.

link.description: A link to the audio file for the word, pronounced by `author`.

items.description: Audio files of the words pronounced out loud

en.description: The original definition in the English version of pu

fr.description: The original definition in the French version of pu

de.description: The original definition in the German version of pu

eo.description: The original definition in the Esperanto version of pu

pu_verbatim.description: The original definition of the word in pu, the first official Toki Pona book

usage.description: The percentage of people in the Toki Pona community who use this word, according to surveys performed by the Linku Project

word.description: General info on a Toki Pona word
